classes.name: Strength & Conditioning
classes.description: This 30 minute strength and conditioning class is a high intensity, interval training workout. This class is designed to improve strength and build lean muscle.

classes.name: Circuit Training
classes.description: Like variety in your workout? Then our circuit training class is for you. A mixture of aerobic, strength and endurance exercises â€“ you never get the same class twice! Based on timed intervals you are pushed to your limits. A great class to mix up your gym routine.

classes.name: Spin
classes.description: Looking to increase your cardio fitness, you need look no further than our Spinning Class. Spin is a 45mins cardio class cycling on stationary indoor bikes. Aimed to get the pulses races and legs burning. From slow hill climbs to quick sprints, you will be cycling them all!
